plot: An in-depth look about the controversy surrounding Kevin Smith's "Dogma", and the effects it had on those involved in its production.
title: Judge Not: In Defense of Dogma

original_name: Judge Not: In Defense of Dogma
plot_en: An in-depth look about the controversy surrounding Kevin Smith's "Dogma", and the effects it had on those involved in its production.
